about_the_game:
Instant sex just by talking! Each of the 21 uniquely charming female elves has individual voice data provided by different voice actors!

The protagonist, who wanders into a village inhabited only by female elves, embarks on a mission to impregnate every elf in this erotic game made with RPG Maker.

No tedious level grinding or material gathering required!

Simply talk to your favorite elf to immediately enjoy a sex scene!

●Story●

The protagonist, wandering deep within the forest for a certain purpose, collapses from exhaustion. He is saved by a beautiful elven village chief but is suddenly milked for his seed!

Moreover, the chief declares that he won't be allowed to leave until he impregnates every female elf in the village, resulting in his confinement.

Can the protagonist return home safely? Or does he even need to return at all?

Thus begins the insatiable protagonist's life of a harem dedicated to impregnating elves…!

●Game Features●

Sex Target Characters: 21 uniquely charming female elves!

Number of Sex Scenes: A total of 21 scenes! You can have sex with every character!

Includes various fetishes like large breasts, ahegao, and 3P!

Sex Scene Voice Acting: Each character is voiced by a different voice actor!

Sex Scene Sound Effects: Includes rhythmic slapping sounds and ejaculation sounds that change with the scene's pace!

Cross-Section View for Sex Scenes: Available (Can be toggled ON/OFF via options)

Ejaculation Countdown in Sex Scenes: Available (Can be toggled ON/OFF via options)

Endings: 2 types

No tedious level grinding or material gathering!

No long story!

Note: All character sprites and event CGs are created using AI-generated illustrations.

Note: As impregnation is the main focus, there are no pregnancy or childbirth scenes included.

content_descriptors.notes:
The male protagonist and the female elves engage in sex in various scenarios!

・The man eats traditional elven vegetables, loses consciousness, and is cared for while having sex

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Alkohol / Tabak

reviews:
“The elven women, with their stunning looks and voluptuous bodies that rival even succubi, live in a village that the protagonist accidentally stumbles upon—only to find himself fulfilling a dream scenario of impregnating them all. Enjoy a lavish harem by traveling around the village, having intimate moments with each of the 21 uniquely charming elven women. While each woman has only one scene, which might feel slightly costly for the amount of content, the unique voice acting for each character and the beauty of the AI-generated illustrations make up for it. As expected with AI art, occasional oddities appear, but they are easy to overlook given the overall quality. It’s also nice that all 21 elves have distinct features. Though this isn’t one of the recent low-cost, high-value games, it’s perfect for a quick break.”
5.0 – ESUKA

“As it is an AI-generated work, the gameplay is quite simple, involving just talking to the characters. However, what sets it slightly apart is the countdown before ejaculation, allowing you to anticipate the climax, which might make it more usable. And of course, elves are as erotic and delightful as ever. Although the variety of positions is limited, the elves getting pleasured and overwhelmed are irresistibly cute. It’s a great choice for quick, casual enjoyment.”
4.0 – 点十

“The protagonist, who finds himself in a dangerous situation after wandering into an elven village, is saved by the elves. In return for their kindness, he embarks on a mission to impregnate every elf in the village. The simplicity of the game lies in just talking to the characters, making events easy to enjoy without hassle. Each elf is uniquely charming, allowing players to experience a variety of reactions. With individual voice acting for every character, the experience feels complete and satisfying.”
5.0 – ミミミョーリュ
short_description: 21 female elves with rich personalities are voiced by different voice actors! The main character wanders into a village of elves where only female elves live, The main character wanders into a village of female elves and has sex with all the elves in the village in order to impregnate them.
